name: You BALLstards!
description:
In this little game you will just jump on a grid of tiles. Falling on them will generate waves, and if those waves catch you or your adversary, you will lose a live. The only way of avoiding it? Jump over it (and increase the wavy chaos)!

It can be played on a keyboard, but most keyboards have problems with so many simultaneous key-presses. It can be played with regular USB gamepads too, and it's usually a better option.

Credits: 

  • Coding - Iris Dominguez
  • Design - Candela Elias 
  • Music - David KBD & Ion Huarte
